title: Oracle
purpose: AI-powered insights and pattern recognition from your trading data.

prerequisites.label: Log some trades first
prerequisites.hint: Oracle needs at least 5 journal entries to generate insights

steps.title: Browse Insight Cards
steps.userAction: Scroll through insight cards on the page
steps.outcome: Discover trading patterns you might have missed

steps.title: Check Today's Takeaway
steps.userAction: Read the highlighted takeaway at top
steps.systemBehavior: Shows the most relevant insight for today

steps.title: Read Full Insight
steps.userAction: Click on an insight card to expand
steps.systemBehavior: Shows full explanation with data backing

steps.title: View Related Trades
steps.systemBehavior: Opens journal filtered to those trades
steps.outcome: See the data behind the pattern

steps.title: Take Suggested Action
steps.userAction: Click the action button on insight
steps.systemBehavior: Opens relevant feature or creates reminder

steps.title: Select Category
steps.systemBehavior: Shows only insights in that category

steps.title: Set Date Range
steps.userAction: Choose time period (Last 7 days, 30 days, etc.)

steps.title: Open Analysis Request
steps.outcome: Ready to ask a specific question

steps.title: Describe Your Question
steps.userAction: Type what you want to understand about your trading

steps.title: Check Reward Banner
steps.userAction: Look at the reward progress banner

steps.title: Complete Required Actions
steps.userAction: Log trades, review insights, complete lessons
